text:
Personal outfits represent me alone,
While unit outfits represent the me in L'Antica.

Because this outfit signifies──
the me in 283 Production.

With everyone in the agency──
feeling connected to many comrades......
I'd even want you to wear it too.

Huh!?
That's going too far, Sakuya...!
Hehe, it might surprisingly suit you, don't you think?

No, no, no!
That's blasphemy against Sakuya and the others.
